PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-07942008-04-25,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActJudges Act
PrecisAppointment of the Honourable HARRY S. LaFORME of Toronto, Ontario, a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, as Commissioner of the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of Harry S. LaForme as Chairperson of the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission, effective June 1, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
